page.title: 02GREENFIELDS FARM
page.content: The farm is down the{Evesham Road about 1km from Stow. It belongs to the {Abbotswood Estate.}It is about 1000 acres and is a{mixed farm.}There are about 500{beef cattle}and 1000 breeding{ewes}which had about 1800 lambs this season. Current prices are about Â£500 per head of cattle and Â£43 for a lamb.{Crops}grown are wheat, malting barley, oats and fodder beet. Large quantities of hay are produced for cattle feed. The farm is not typical because it has quite a lot of permanent pasture. The fleeces also provide a source of income but the farmer is being pressed to increase profits. Intensive use of {machinery}has reduced the staff needed to work the farm.
